resources.string: The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids that compose the grid contains all of the digits from 1 to 9
The objective is to fill the grid with only one color
You can control the Cell at Up West and all the cells that are nearby it and has the same color. Every time you change the color of the first cell, all reachable cells with the same colo changes too!
The objective is to align all the cells to have rows with same colors
Click on one cell to do an action. If the cell is nearby the hole, the cell is moved on the hole. Otherwise the circle that contain the cell will rotate.
The objective is to move the frog over all leaf
Click on the leaf that you want to reach. Remember that the frog cannot go backward a cannot move diagonally
Complete the level and shut up!!!
Complete the level and shut up!!!
